dcterms:creator: D. W. Shattuck
D. L. E. Hill
D. J. Hawkes
M. O. Leach
J. C. Gee
dcterms:description: The LPBA40 dataset contains brain MR images of 40 neurologically intact nonepileptic subjects with segmentation labels for 56 brain regions. The images were registered to the Montreal Neurological Institute (MNI) space using affine transformation based on the ICBM152 template.
dcterms:title: LPBA40

dcterms:creator: V. Fonov
D. W. Shattuck
D. L. E. Hill
D. J. Hawkes
M. O. Leach
J. C. Gee
dcterms:description: The ICBM152 template is an unbiased average age-appropriate atlas used for pediatric studies, providing a standard reference for neuroimaging analysis.
dcterms:title: ICBM152 template
